data.title: Office Closings and Emergencies
data.text:
Florida Subscribe

The following Social Security office(s) will temporarily stop all in-person service on Friday, August 9, 2024, at the time shown below. Assistance will still be available by telephone until 4pm:

Ft Walton Beach - 32547 (2:00 PM CT)

Kissimmee - 34741 (2:00 PM ET)

The following Social Security office is only able to provide assistance by telephone today, August 9, 2024. There is no in-person service today:

Lake Mary - 32746

Georgia Subscribe

The following Social Security Hearing Office is only able to provide assistance by telephone today, Friday, August 9, 2024. There is no in-person service today. Members of the public that are scheduled for in-person and Video Teleconference (VTC) hearings will be contacted to reschedule. Hearings scheduled to be conducted by telephone or online video will be conducted as scheduled:

Savannah - 31406

Illinois Subscribe

The following Social Security Hearing Office is only able to provide assistance by telephone from Monday, August 19, 2024 to Friday, August 23, 2024. Members of the public that are scheduled for in-person and Video Teleconference (VTC) hearings will be contacted to reschedule. Hearings scheduled to be conducted by telephone or online video will be conducted as scheduled:

Chicago - 60603

The following Social Security offices are only able to provide assistance by telephone until further notice. There is no in-person service:

Chicago East - 60637

New York Subscribe

The following Social Security office will stop all in-person service on Friday, August 9, 2024, at the time shown below. Assistance will be available by telephone until 4pm:

Binghamton - 13901 (2:00 PM)

Corning - 14830 (12:45 PM)

Dunkirk - 14048 (10:15 AM)

Horseheads - 14845 (12:45 PM)

Ithaca - 14850 (2:15 PM)

The following Social Security offices are only able to provide assistance by telephone until further notice. There is no in-person service:

Hylan Blvd - 10305

West Nyack - 10994

North Carolina Subscribe

The following Social Security offices are only able to provide assistance by telephone today, Friday, August 9, 2024. There will be no in-person service today:

Fayetteville - 28301

On Friday, August 9, 2024, the following Social Security office(s) are unable to provide in-person service until the time shown below. Assistance is available by telephone:

Wilmington - 28401 (10:00 AM)

Ohio Subscribe

The following Social Security offices are only able to provide assistance by telephone from Thursday, August 8, 2024 to Tuesday, August 13, 2024. There will be no in-person service during this period:

Cleveland - 44110
